title: Payback
creator_credit: Penny McDonald, Warwick Thornton and Blackfella Films
brief_description: Paddy, an old aboriginal man, has been in jail for twenty years. It is the day of his release. Paddy knows of two laws - white law and black law. The twenty years he has spent doing time for the white man’s law has been in preparation for this one - his payback day.
creator_credit_for_label: Penny McDonald, Warwick Thornton and Blackfella Films
